mapper.select: select r.review_num, r.product_code, p.product_name, c.member_code, c.member_name, r.review_star, r.review_title, r.review_content, r.review_date from review as r, products as p, customers as c where r.product_code = p.product_code

select r.review_num, r.product_code, p.product_name, c.member_code, c.member_name, r.review_star, r.review_title, r.review_content, r.review_date, r.review_img from review as r, products as p, customers as c where r.product_code = #{product_code} and r.product_code = p.product_code;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (product_code, member_code, review_star, review_title, review_content, review_img) VALUES (#{product_code}, #{member_code}, #{review_star}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{review_img})
